name: 3 in 1: Fashion Games!
description: Bring Fashion to your everyday life!

name: LongHead
description: Elliot and Logan are neighbors. They don't like each other's company, but they can't live without each other. but they like a challenge! Game rules: turn on the taps to relieve pressure in the pipes.

name: Rocket Inc
description: Help build mankind's last magnificent structure in this game where you carry out transport missions between planets in the solar system. Build your company and prepare to take off! Earn humankind's respect with more missions.

name: Space Dudes vs Alien Dudes
description: Space Dudes vs Alien Dudes - Alien Dudes are attacking the base, It's up to the space dudes to stop them!

name: Slayer of Sin
description: Slayer Of Sin is a 2D action platformer with simple hack-and-slash mechanics, incorporating arcade-like combat and art. Slayer Of Sin follows an unnamed hero's quest to save the human realm from the seven distinct demons, The Seven Deadly Sins.

name: A Walk With My Dog
description: Go on a walk with me and my dog Ezio. Play fetch, tug of war, explore & enjoy the sounds of nature!

name: Intrusion of Alice
description: The agent "Alice" was secretly and unofficially sent in from the army for a secret mission alone. Her mission was to extract or destroy "the device" brought in to "Nereid" before the terrorists put their hands on it. With no help from outside, what would happen to Alice......

name: Lost Amulets: Four Guardians
description: A unique combo of hidden object games, tile-matching puzzles and challenging mini-games!

name: Daemonum
description:
A Heart To Reclaim
Call for help and horror

name: Jotunn: Day of Judgement
description: Jotunn is a small First-Person-Horror experience. Set in a dark and mysterious norse forest, the player is tasked with activating multiple magic runestones to open the Serpent-Gate and to escape the mystical forest.

name: 69 Naomi Hot
description: 69 Naomi Hot - Puzzle with visual novel elements. Naomi loves music and guitars very much. She invites you to play the guitar with her, but unfortunately the strings break. What to do now is up to you.

name: Sowon
description: In the middle of the night, while finding her parents, a girl falls to the toy world through attic locked for a long time. Will it be possible for her to find her parents and go back to her world? Let's solve some puzzles and explore the mysterious toy world.

name: Starlight Mario: Underworld
description: A sequel to Starlight Mario consisting of 12 brand-new levels (3 worlds), along with new custom music and animations. Mario has found himself in a dark realm and must retrieve the skeleton key before it’s too late.

name: Space Fun
description: Space Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: The Jumping Pumpkin: Halloween Edition
description: Join Big P on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Age of Empires IV: Anniversary Edition
description: This new package includes the base game, all updates made to Age of Empires IV since launch, including the Anniversary Update, and the two new civilizations — the Ottomans and Malians — in one package.

name: Stockwrk7
description: A short First Person Horror-Adventure on a single Floor. Explore the Floor and try to solve the riddles. But don't get too deep into it. You don't know what you'll find.

name: All in! Bundle
description:
Get seven full games in one! Have a blast in your collection! Including:

- Awakening of Cthulhu
- Drift Racing Madness
- Color Motif Deluxe
- Alchemists's Castle
- Minefield
- Soccer Pinball
- World of Riders

name: Saturn Quest: R.U.N.E. 3000
description: Saturn Quest: R.U.N.E. 3000 is a tragic Alien Space Opera featuring asystematic Action-RTS battles and epic plot of mythological proportions.

name: Bones of Halloween
description: How long can you survive the night of the pumpkin skeletons? A small but spooky first-person shooter with a Halloween theme

name: NSG
description: NSG tells a story about Hugo, on his last year as a high school student, while he confronts the great dilemma of choosing a career. He dreams about making a movie and needs to decide between his dream and financial stability.

name: Magic Axolotl
description: Magic Axolotl is a tiny game about draw the spells on the screen to defeat the enemies.

name: Freedom Drive
description: Drive for your life, and Freedom. Defeat your challengers, upgrade your vehicle or purchase new more powerful vehicles with your winnings. Race the clock to beat your best time and earn more rewards.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Vault Edition
description:
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II drops players into an unprecedented global conflict that features the return of the iconic Operators of Task Force 141. Available on all platforms, the digital-only Vault Edition offers the most content of any version of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II.

In addition to the base game – Cross-Gen Bundle version on consoles, Standard Edition on PC – and Early Access to the Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II Open Beta*, the Vault Edition includes the following bonus content:

- Red Team 141 Operator Pack: includes four playable Multiplayer Operators: Ghost, Farah, Price, and Soap. Each Operator comes equipped with a custom-made masked outfit themed around the legendary mercenary Ghost.
- FJX Cinder Weapon Vault
- One season of the Battle Pass and 50 Tier Skips (or its equivalent) at launch.
- Ghost Legacy Pack: Instantly unlock 12 Operator Skins for the Ghost Operator and 10 Assault Rifle Weapon Blueprints for use in Call of Duty: Warzone and Call of Duty: Modern Warfare (2019).
- Players who purchase the Vault Edition through the in-game store in Call of Duty: Warzone, Call of Duty: Vanguard, Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War, or Call of Duty: Modern Warfare will receive 10 hours of Double XP Tokens and 10 hours of Double Weapon XP Tokens for use in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II. XP Tokens will be waiting for you and available to use in-game at launch.

name: Resident Evil Village: Cloud Version
description: Resident Evil Village is a first person survival horror and the sequel to Resident Evil 7: Biohazard. The game maintains elements from previous Resident Evil games with players having to scavenge environments for items and manage their resources. However, it adds more action-oriented gameplay, with higher enemy counts and a greater emphasis on combat.

name: CoComelon: Play with JJ
description: Come over for a playdate with JJ full of musical minigames, interactive objects, and favorite singalongs like Yes Yes Vegetables and Wheels on the Bus!

name: Vade Retro: Exorcist
description: Vade Retro is a 4 player PvP exorcism game. Play as Demon and make your opponents go through hell, or join the exorcist team by choosing a specialty to save victims from the devil's grip in this action-packed experience.

name: Package Rush
description: Package Rush is a strategy game about planning a delivery route system in a fast-growing city. Build and modify routes to get all packages on time. How long can you keep delivering?

name: The Classrooms
description: The Classrooms is a procedural, liminal-space, found-footage, survival horror game. Explore The Classrooms and discover the various anomalies it contains; from malicious entities, to harmless oddities. And remember, it's different every time you play, so your found footage is uniquely yours.

name: Nekomew's Nightmares
description: Face Nekomew's nightmares in this spooky rhythm game!

name: Junkyard Fury 2
description: A horror first person strategy game! Shut down the killer cars before it's too late!

name: Sneaky IT Support
description: Sneaky IT Support is a simulation game where you find naughty secrets in employee computers. Every laptop has a problem you have to fix within a given time limit. If you're fast enough, you'll have time to look around for their naughty secrets. The more secrets you find, the more money you'll make.

name: Machine Gun Fury
description: On a bold and potentially dangerous mission to revive the classic Arcade military shooter. Fully loaded with addictive top-down and side-scrolling run-and-gun gameplay, pixel-perfect 2D graphics, explosive SID soundtrack and massive destruction! Fight on foot and in heavily armed vehicles.

name: Death Bowl
description: Death Bowl is a 2D precision platformer where you race through a deadly obstacle course to compete for the fastest time. The odds are against you, but with the help of experimental drugs, you just might live to see another day.

name: Albert Innovation
description: Albert Innovation is an immersive, narrative linear horror game, where you will attempt to unravel the mysteries of what was once the most brilliant technological innovation company of the olden days. Manipulate machines, run away, and put an end to this nightmare.

name: Resident Evil Village: Gold Edition
description:
Resident Evil Village: Gold Edition includes the base game with 3 additional major new features:
- Third Person Mode allows you to play the main story mode from a new perspective
- The Mercenaries Additional Orders introduces new playable characters and stages
- Shadows of Rose continues the story of Ethan's daughter Rosemary

name: Resident Evil Village: Winters' Expansion
description: This expansion adds third person mode to the main campaign, new playable characters and stages to Mercenaries mode, and a story continuation called Shadows of Rose.

name: Charon's Staircase
description: In this first-person horror mystery game, you set out to bury the horrible past of a tyrannical government. Retrieve and destroy the documents that unravel the secrets that lie beneath Oack Grove. Will you discover the terrifying truth and find your way out?

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II
description: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II drops players into an unprecedented global conflict that features the return of the iconic Operators of Task Force 141.

name: Astral Flux
description: Astral Flux is an action-platformer with roguelite elements. Join two scrappers who are lost in space and find themselves caught up in an intergalactic mystery. Traverse hostile alien planets, discover dark secrets, and face powerful foes in combat. Death is inevitable, but it’s only the beginning. Carve a new path forward using the knowledge from your previous attempts. You’ll need to sharpen your skills to unravel this mystery.

name: Dashpong
description: Dashpong is a high energy arcade local multiplayer game where you dash all around the maps at full speed. Create paddles to defend your goal and shoot the ball at your opponent to score. Enjoy the game up to 4 players in local multiplayer.

name: Fall For You
description: Fall For You is a rhythm-based roguelike. Move and attack with the beat to power up, win the hearts of every damned soul you meet, traverse perilous obstacle courses, win fabulous prizes that change the way you play, and cuddle with a scary demon mom to keep yourself going!

name: Cesspool
description: Cesspool is a chill, psychedelic and minimalist JRPG in a weird post-apocalyptic world! The game is an accessible, minimalist experience and is about 5 hours for the main story (double for 100%).

name: Catch Me If You Can
description: Chase your friends in this heart-racing "Tag" based game. Use a grappling hook and bouncy physics to your advantage.

name: Resident Evil Re:Verse
description: Beloved Resident Evil characters clash in a fight to the death! Test your skills against other players in six-person deathmatch battles. But don't forget the terrifying bioweapons! You'll need to master the skills of the heroes and bioweapons alike if you want to claw your way to victory!

name: Bayonetta 3
description: You’ve waited long enough. The witch. Is. Back! A new-look Bayonetta returns to battle foes with her signature Witch Time! This time, she’ll wield her new Demon Masquerade ability to channel the power of demons and engage in larger-than-life action.

name: Do Dishes As Spencer
description: This is how spencer does dishes because he is over 6ft.

name: Pumpkin Attack!
description:
The Halloween’s Day is coming but the skeletons want to replace it with the Skeleton’s Day! Only Pumpkin Smith riding a rocket with a laser cannon can save the day!

Defeat the minions and fight the four skeleton bosses: Skeletog, Skeledemon, Skelebi, and Skeleskull. Each final boss has a weak point, but you need to discover it.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Moonshade Epic
description:
Version 6.1 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of the "The Day of Transcending Finality" arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Jade Knight
• New Open World: New Atra Sanctuary
• New Story Chapter XXXII: End of the World
• New Featured Event: Midnight Chronicle
• ...and more!

name: Oh No, My Moustache!
description:
An arcade, vertical shoot 'Em up where you play as Fred, a barman of a wild west saloon.
But… Oh no, some stranger robots have appeared out of nowhere, equipped with razors and apparently they want to… cut your fabulous moustache?
That can't happen. So you must defend yourself, avoiding them to get close to you throwing them the only thing that you have, shots of tequila.
Survive as long as you can. The more robots you kill, the stronger they get and the more they will come after you. Each robot eliminated will grant you some points, try to get the highest score!

name: Hololore: Amethyst
description: 3 idols journey through friendship and misunderstandings.

name: Reborn
description:
You are who you want to be.

Your VR social game platform.

All worlds built by open creative community with love.

name: Serendipity: The Mafias
description: A Story of the twisted fates in a brutal world.

name: Slime Quest
description:
The MMORPG "players" have been hunting us and turning us into EXP and alchemy materials.
You're a surviving slime, the only hero who can save their kind!

name: Sparkle Milla: Eight Genetic Abnormalities and a Blood Ghost
description: This game is a deduction game where you collect evidence from a murder scene to find the murderer. Eight boys and girls are admitted to the school. At the school, there is a crazy ghost named "Milla" who haunts and kills people.

name: Candy Creeps
description: Play as Elma and Harper, two tweens who may or may not have inadvertently summoned the evil Pumpking, who has swiped the whole neighborhood's Halloween candy and hidden it inside his army of tiny, adorable decorative gourds. Smash the pumpkins to find candy, then chow down. Once you're turbo-charged with sugar, transform into a costume-clad avenger and bash the Pumpking until he explodes! Master four unique levels and go for a high score in one- and two-player modes.

name: Evil Dead: The Game - Hail to the King Bundle
description: Dive into the release of the Hail to the King update with exciting new content!

name: The Witch's House
description: There is an old house on the edge of a small town. All the locals have always avoided it, as strange and mysterious events constantly happen there. This time, what happened in this house made the whole city shudder with fear.

name: Kao the Kangaroo: Yooka x Kao
description: Legends speak of a powerful duo who once collected every single item, even as far as the eye could see. Secrets revealed, coins collected, challenges overcome. They say to reflect your heroes, you must reflect their ways… The power of friendship and a lo…

name: Star Ocean: The Divine Force - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
A Star Ocean 25th Anniversary commemorative product. Includes all the beautiful pieces composed for the game's soundtrack. You'll also be able to obtain in-game items with special abilities, which will work to your favour on your adventure.

At the end of infinite space…
When our two heroes cross paths
The fate of the universe awakens

name: Jewel Match Twilight 2
description: Make your blood run cold... with this spooky match-3 adventure! A scourge has taken over the kingdom and destroyed its strongholds. Traverse a dark land full of haunted horrors! Keep evil at bay in 90 enormous levels designed to delight and fill you with fright.

name: DobbyxEscape: Halloween Adventure
description: A fun Halloween inspired Room Escape game!

name: RealFlight Evolution
description: RealFlight is the industry-leading flight simulator for radio-controlled airplanes, helicopters, and drones. Fly more than 300 hyper-realistic vehicles in an immense, open world right from your desktop. This RC classic is a must-have tool for flight enthusiasts of all skill levels!

name: Loser's Romance
description: The no social skills dating sim.

name: The Lord of the Parties: Byakko Akine
description: “Byakko Akine”, the energetic Vtuber that loves FPS games and energy drinks has joined The Lord of the Parties!

name: Into Ruins
description: Jump down holes, fight monsters, and collect orbs as you make your way through cave formations and crumbling dungeons in this chaotic pico8 roguelike.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Risotto Nero DLC
description: The leader of La Squadra Esecuzioni, Risotto Nero, has joined the roster of All-Star Battle R! Have your opponents say their prayers when they fight against Risotto Nero's metallic manipulation!

name: Synaxarion: Acts Part 1
description: Starting from the Crucifixion of Christ, you play as a disciple of Christ and witness key events in the early Church. ‘Synaxarion: Acts Part 1’ takes place during a portion of the Biblical Book of Acts that is enriched with additional history and tradition from the Synaxarion.

name: Isekai Harem Saver
description:
Isekai Harem Saver is a novel game in which the protagonist "Daigo", saves the world of harem while encountering various incidents.
This Bishojo Game originally released under the "Genyukyo" brand has been reworked for the "CS Novels" so that they can be enjoyed by players all over the world.

name: Car+ Toon Race: Rally Valley Champion
description: An animated car racing game created with cartoon rendering! Play against each other! Be the champion in every race!

name: Mass Creation Double Action Bundle
description: Shing! and Corridor Z team up for double excitement and double the amount of fun and fun!

name: SD Gundam Battle Alliance: Unit and Scenario Pack 3
description:
Includes:
Additional Scenario Missions
- Rebirth by Destruction
- Flash of Fate

EX Mission Extreme 5

Additional Playable Units
- Gundam Exia Repair IV
- Xi Gundam
- Penelope

name: BOT.vinnik Chess: Prodigies
description: Do you think you have nothing to learn from a child? And what about the world's greatest chess prodigies of all time? Let BOT.vinnik - the Soviet digital trainer - show you how.

name: Goreagulation
description: Deposited into a labyrinth of flesh and metal, you see things others won't believe, experience horrors beyond ordinary comprehension, and witness impossibilities that drive lesser men mad. Only one directive remains evident in your mind - Ascend the Spire. Destroy the Eye.

name: Sins of a Solar Empire II
description: Battle for galactic dominance in this real-time 4X strategy game with unrivaled scale! You’ll explore, expand, exploit, and exterminate through military force, diplomacy, trade, culture, influence, and other underhanded tactics.

name: Perfect Inventory
description: Perfect Inventory is an organization puzzle game that brings you to a medieval age in the role of a methodical squire trying to make his best to fit all the items perfectly into the inventory.

name: Jewel Match Twilight
description: Unravel this creepy-crawly match-3 adventure and unveil haunted castles that will leave your spine tingling! Explore vast levels and buy upgrades from the sinister shop to aid you in your travels. Enjoy a spellbinding soundtrack while you explore each of the 120 huge match-3 levels.

name: VR Dragon Flight
description: In "VR Dragon Flight", players will play as a dragon warrior, driving a flying dragon to soar in the air.

name: Arcade Archives: Ordyne
description:
"Ordyne" is a shooting game released by Namco in 1988.
Players take control of Doctor Tomari and his assistant CHIN to rescue the doctor's lover KANA from the villainous Kubota.
The key to the game is using the crystals you get from defeating enemies to buy powerful weapons.

name: Surgineer
description:
Have you ever dreamed of being a real surgeon? Well… you are not gonna learn that here.

Welcome to the most unrealistic surgery simulator where everyone can instantly become a terrible doctor.

You will have to solve hilarious surgical procedures ranging from CPR to brain transplant or even removing alien eggs from a poor patient using a robotic arm!

You always thought you had that surgeon in you? You better have a bulletproof malpractice insurance before getting your virtual hands on a patient!

name: Hentai Bodysuit
description: Hentai Bodysuit is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of BodySuit and 24 beautiful girls with their own characteristics. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Mina Mangkukulam
description: Mina Mangkukulam is a retro RPG in the style of Old Point and Click adventure games. set in a somewhat Halloween themed school setting with many tropes, references and callouts to Philippine culture and mythology.

name: Citizen Sleeper: Episode - Refuge
description: Refuge is the second installment in a three-episode arc, which will conclude in early 2023. It picks up right where the previous episode, Flux left off. A strange event sends ripples through Erlin’s Eye. You will enter the refugee flotilla that arrived during Flux to understand this new threat, and help the refugees stabilize their community.

name: Pocket Witch
description:
Face different challenges to help the little witch escape from a dungeon full of traps and enemies, where she was trapped by a great evil sorcerer.

Together with her bat friend, the little witch will have to jump and dash through many obstacles in this short 2D platformer.

name: Dot Tanki
description: MOBA PvP game in which two teams fight tanks, and other vehicles for victory.

name: The Shadow People
description: The Shadow People is a retro point and click horror adventure game with a minimalistic aesthetic. As a student cramming for finals, you drive all the way to school, sit through class, and try to slog your way back home. But fatigue sets in, and dark creatures dance in the edge of your eyesight.

name: Good Night, Peregrine
description: A short experimental visual novel where you spend time with the titular Perry, a shut in recluse gamer, and his friends. Meet a colorful cast of characters in a strange world much like our own. Learn and explore secrets from the past. There is no happy ending to this game.

name: Hidden Dungeon Top-Down 3D
description: The game is a hidden object game in which you need to find objects with a certain design in beautiful locations, and click on them with the mouse.

name: Tinkertown x Among Us
description: After killing an entire crew and taking over their ship, an impostor mistakes a bright light in the world of Tinkertown for his secret haven, crash-landing on the planet. This opens up a brand new quest in Tinkertown where players can explore the crashed ship, solve puzzles blocking their way and escape with loot without getting caught by the impostor roaming the ship. Find a bunch of cool Among Us themed costumes, hats and decorative items and objects that can be used to decorate your houses back in your village.

name: Oddworld: Soulstorm Oddtimized Edition
description:
The Oddtimized Edition is the Nintendo Switch optimised version Oddworld: Soulstorm.

Oddworld: Soulstorm is a modern re-imagining of the 1998 title Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus. It serves as a direct sequel to Oddworld: New 'n' Tasty. The player controls Abe, a reluctant hero who inadvertently sparked an uprising and now must lead his fellow Mudokons in their fight for freedom against the Magog Cartel and the planet’s ruling power

name: Frog Detective: The Entire Mystery
description:
You're a detective, and a frog, and it's time to solve 3 thrilling mysteries!

For the first time, all 3 Frog Detective cases are available in one package.

Play as the #2 best investigator as you find clues, question silly suspects, and look at things through your magnifying glass. Some nay-sayers have called the magnifying glass "useless", but what do they know?

Frog Detective: The Entire Mystery is a family-friendly yet witty take on the detective game genre. Solve the mysteries on your own, or play along with friends as you take turns reading out the dialogue. Think you can crack the case?

name: Ace Angler: Fishing Spirits
description: Shake and spin the Joy-Con, and feel like you're out on the ocean waves! The latest Ace Angler title is set in an aquarium-themed amusement park! Play the park's various attractions by yourself or with friends to collect Medals, which you can then use to upgrade your aquarium!

name: The Inverse
description: Defend yourself against the creatures and destroy the FlipSide!

name: Dariusburst: Chronicle Saviours - Core + Taito & Sega Packs
description:
Burst into the depths of parallel space!
New combatants join the fray!

name: Tales of Howl Town
description:
Stop the werewolves and solve the mystery of Howl Town.

Tales of Howl Town is a single-player mystery-themed puzzle game playable on Amazon.com. As Amazon delivery driver Zara Briggs, you must identify and banish four werewolves disguised as town villagers. But be warned: banishing the wrong villagers may have disastrous consequences!

Tales of Howl Town is available to US players from 10/27/2022 to 10/31/2022.

name: Cubic Parking
description:
Cubic Parking is a minimalistic parking based puzzle game where you need to move the double triangle block from right side of the field to the left.
There will be multiple blocks (one, two and three blocks shapes) on your way and you need to free the space by moving them. The directions you can move the block are limited and are indicated with arrows.
You can move the double triangle block only back and forward.

name: Tilecraft
description: 'Tilecraft: A New Horizon' is a minimalist and relaxing strategy game about discovering and building on your explored tiles. Explore a procedurally generated set of resources across the map in this unique and casual atmosphere.

name: Pixel Artist
description: Unleash your inner artist and create beautiful works of art. Choose a blank canvas from one of the 8 categories and paint by number. Fill your art gallery with over 100 paintings of different shapes and sizes.

name: Ultimate Custom Night VR
description: Like the original game but on steroids.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition includes Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr and all additional content.

You are an Inquisitor, the Imperium's most powerful agent.
In this action-RPG, choose from amongst several character classes and take part in tactical and violent combat, in solo or co-op mode.

name: Army of Ruin
description:
Army of Ruin is an auto-shooter in which you guide legendary heroes on a quest to defeat the Armies of Evil.

Get hold of a deadly arsenal capable of slaying hundreds of enemies in seconds, and you may have a shot at defeating the deadly Army Generals!

name: Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram From Hibernia - Collector's Edition
description:
Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram From Hibernia - Collector's Edition includes:
- Game: Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram From Hibernia
- Collector's Box
- Obelix figurine 18cm tall
- Two sticker sheets
- 3 lithographs

name: The Unluckiest Man
description: After his wife draws her last breath, Dragomir is devastated. As a poor man with a drinking habit, he must not only manage to hold a decent funeral, but also stand for himself in a small town that doesn't see him with good eyes.

name: Devi & Pii
description: A new Sega Genesis/Mega Drive game released on the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive Mini 2.

name: Space Harrier II
description: A port of the Arcade game, made exclusively for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive Mini 2.

name: Vs. Puyo Puyo Sun
description: A port of the Arcade game, made exclusively for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive Mini 2.

name: Super Locomotive
description: A port of the Arcade game, made exclusively for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive Mini 2.

name: Spatter
description: A port of the Arcade game, made exclusively for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive Mini 2.

name: Fantasy Zone
description: A port of the Arcade game, made exclusively for the Sega Genesis Mini 2/Mega Drive Mini 2.

name: Sega Genesis Mini 2
description: The international version of the Sega Genesis Mini is an Amazon exclusive product. It contains games from the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive, as well from the Sega CD. It has a newly developed game called Devi & Pii and new exclusive ports of arcade games.

name: Mega Drive Mini 2
description: The second version of the Mega Drive Mini, released in Japan on 27 October 2022. This new iteration will include 50 games, some of them being Mega CD titles. This is the Japanese version of the mini console.

name: 30 Minutes to Die
description: Slay never-ending legions of monsters while running in circles! 30minutestodie is a dark fantasyr casual game with rogue-lite elements. Choose from a variety of weapons and perks and make every playthrough a different experience. Unlock many characters each one with different abilities.

name: Hellway to Hell
description: Hellway To Hell combines the advantages of logic games, retro stylistics and is maintained in a dark-fun atmosphere. Inherits such titles as Bomberman (stealth elements) or diablo (hack'n'slash, character development)

name: Horse Club Adventures 2: Hazelwood Stories
description: Saddled, up and away! Ride together with the girls from Horse Club and discover a colorful world full of adventure.

name: Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram From Hibernia - Day One Edition
description: Join Asterix & Obelix in a brand-new original story in… Hibernia! Explore this crazy action-adventure in a local coop mode up to 4 players !

name: Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram From Hibernia - Limited Edition
description:
Join Asterix & Obelix in a brand-new original story in… Hibernia! Explore this crazy action-adventure in a local coop mode up to 4 players!

Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram From Hibernia - Limited Edition includes:
- Game: Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram From Hibernia
- Two sticker sheets
- 3 lithographs

name: Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram From Hibernia
description: Join Asterix & Obelix in a brand-new original story in… Hibernia! Explore this crazy action-adventure in a local coop mode up to 4 players!

name: D.C.4: Da Capo 4 - Fortunate Departures
description: A little time has passed since the love story that changed the world…

name: Tsuri Spirits: Tsutte Asoberu Suizokukan
description: Tsuri Spirits: Tsutte Asoberu Suizokukan is a top-down over-the-top fishing video medal game. The game is set within an aquatic theme park, with players participating in attractions using their own customizable avatar (reminiscent of those from the Animal Crossing series). As players earn more medals, they can spend them to not only upgrade the medal games, but also acquire fish for the park's explorable exotic aquarium.

name: Arkanoid: Eternal Battle
description: The return of the iconic block breaker game from prestigious Japanese video game company Taito!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr
description: Sin descripción

name: Blowfly: DungHole Wanderer
description: This is an NES style platformer game, fly and explore to find pink poo in the map and destroy them, which is the only condition to pass the level. You need to avoid dangerous traps, defeat the alien creature AssMan that invades the earth, and achieve the final victory!

name: SGS Korean War
description: The first intense conflict of the Cold War, this war is very often forgotten, its very rapid and dynamic but unknown aspect obliterated by months of stagnation following the first year of operations in Korea. Can you make it remembered?

name: Project Noah
description: Welcom aboard! You're now the crew of Revision, global leading company of space exploration. Operate Project Noah. Follow the manual. The destiny of space explorer dog Noah is on your hand.

name: Panic Porcupine
description: Dr. Proventriculus is snatching up the Chickabirbs! Help Panic blast through over 50 stages of topsy-turvy, spike-laced, slime-drenched, buzzsaw-filled deathtraps to rescue them! And remember, there are no rings...

name: A Crown of Sorcery and Steel
description: Swing a sword, delve dungeons, and lead a resistance against the tyrannical queen of a war-torn fantasy realm. Will you unite the realm and end the queen’s reign of terror... or join her and rule by her side?

name: Opus Castle: Chapter 2
description: Continue the journey in this adventure and mysterious game with a narrative based on the real tragic history of the little castle on Apa Street, located in the city of São Paulo, Brazil.

name: Iron Guard
description: A sci-fi Tower Defense game. Strategize to destroy waves of rogue robots and assist the powerful turrets with player controlled drone. Build and collect resources and help evacuate your crew from the alien planet.

name: Squarewood Farm
description: A relaxing and addictive farm-themed block puzzler. Harvest crops by forming rows, columns or squares with strangely shaped seeds. Use the profits from your vegetables to purchase tools, buy animals, or expand your humble farm.

name: Into the Abyss
description: A 1st-person survival horror game. Explore and find your way through horrific environments. Find clues and solve puzzles to advance. Running might be the best way to stay alive.

name: Aldebaran Legend
description: In a village located to the south, there is one of the twelve guardians, the warrior of Leo, known for his determination in combat and number of victories. Our hero will be responsible for finding the mystical artifacts, to prevent the kingdom from being bathed in blood and darkness.

name: Yaga: Roots of Evil
description: Oakvale - a village under siege by corrupted beasts. Will Ivan bow to the anger of the people, listen to the Woodsman's plea or decide Leshy's fate all on his own?

name: Star Ocean: The Divine Force
description: Star Ocean: The Divine Force is the next installment in the Star Ocean series. The game features a story that blends sci-fi and fantasy, a rich lineup of characters and side stories, a battle system delivering exhilarating combat with easy controls, and more. The “Double Hero” system returns in which the story spanning the stars and beyond will unfold from the perspective of each protagonist, one from an advanced civilization (sci-fi) and the other from an underdeveloped planet (fantasy). Events that unfold throughout the story as well as the ally characters you end up with will differ based on the protagonist the player chooses.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Frog Detective 3: Corruption at Cowboy County
description: You're a detective, and a frog, and it's time to solve a mystery in the wild west.

name: Saturnalia
description: Saturnalia is a survival-horror adventure inspired and heavily influenced by the folklore of Sardinia, Italy, a region rich with unique traditions and culture. You play as four characters, experiencing a deeply connected storyline that ties back to the haunting traditions of this ancient village. The village itself is an elaborate maze with no two iterations being precisely the same - you will have to explore and solve the mysteries of the game largely unguided. Die, and watch the village reconfigure itself into a new form. Solve puzzles and open shortcuts to new areas with tools and items you find along the way, unlocking every piece of the story with different characters, each suited for another aspect of exploration and investigation. With a limited supply of matches to light your way and darkness encroaching, can you find your way through the fog to reveal the truth? Or will you be engulfed by the secrets this town doesn’t want you to know?

name: Action 69
description:
Action 69 is a video game compilation developed by TeamCS1 for the Windows platform.

21 exclusive games parodying on retro classics and my own spin on my favourite games.

Games that cover a variety of genres from racing to card games to open world and RPG's you're bound to find something you love.

name: Signalis
description: Signalis is a classic survival horror experience with a unique aesthetic, full of melancholic mystery. Investigate a dark secret, solve puzzles, fight off nightmarish creatures and navigate dystopian, surreal retrotech worlds as Elster, a technician Replika searching for her lost dreams.

name: Aquarium.
description: This is the summer story of Aqua - a beginning maid carrying a secret - and her master (the player) who lost part of his memory. This is the pure summer love story of two individuals from completely different walks of life.

name: Paper Cut Mansion
description: A horror game about a guy lost in a mansion where everything is made of cardboard. Escaping from the house won’t be an easy task! Some of the rooms are locked and the player will need to solve different types of riddles to advance through the levels. The hints to solve the riddles will be hidden inside the furniture of the mansion but watch out! You don’t know what else is lurking inside those cardboard models!

name: Grimoire
description: A casual Minesweeper-like for Playdate.

name: Pursuit of Power 2
description: Pursuit of Power 2 is a fast-paced real-time strategy game with pixel art. You assume the role of a powerful leader, which can be a Shadow Knight, Stalker, or Mage. Choose ability upgrades for your leader. Dynamic world events. Manage fortresses. Campaign and skirmish (local or network).

name: A Last Ditch Effort
description: A Last Ditch Effort is a short horror puzzle game that's inspired by outer wilds.

name: Oh My Eggs
description: Oh My Eggs is a wave survival game in which you'll defend your brother's eggs that predators are stealing, acquire eggs, and trade them for upgrades, weapons, and specials.

name: War Thunder: Greek AH-64A Apache
Floor Plan Remastered
description:
The classic VR escape game is back by popular demand, with new graphics and features for Meta Quest!

Floor Plan Remastered is a short-form puzzle adventure that takes place entirely inside an elevator. Go floor to floor, find items, and meet a bizarre cast of characters. Discover relationships between different things in the building and unlock its secrets... all from the comfort of your elevator.

name: Tower Stack
description: Tower Stack is a highly challenging and visually pleasing hyper-casual stacking game where the goal is to stack as many tiles as possible on top of each other without losing tile size. The longer it goes on, the faster the tiles move, making it even more difficult to keep your tower from collapsing.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 44 - The Sins of Black Adam
description: Sin descripción

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Rewritten
description: Five Nights at Freddy's Rewritten is a re-imagining of FNAF 1.

name: Brawlhalla BCX 2022 Pack
description: Be a part of the seventh Brawlhalla World Championship with the BCX 2022 Pack! This limited time pack contains 300 Mammoth Coins, the BCX 2022 Avatar and an exclusive Mammoth Rocketfan Sidekick. A must-have for followers of Brawlhalla esports!

name: Tanuki's Spring Walk
description:
You get a letter from your fox friend, Kitsune, on a pleasant spring morning.

It's time to go on a walk!

A novel game stroll which you play by making choices. Pick up ingredients on the way to Kitsune's house.

name: Breaking Clouds and Blooming Light
description: Sin descripción

name: Sex Adventures: Vampire Express Train
description: An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of a young woman embarking on a train filled with ageless vampires, in hopes of seducing one of them and get bitten to become immortal.

name: Obakeidoro!: Castlevania Collaboration Character DLC Bundle
description:
From Castlevania swoops in Alucard, a mysterious man who can transform into a bat, and Leon Belmont, a honest man who wields the whip!

This DLC contains the following:
- Alucard
- Alucard Sword
- Leon Belmont

name: Dire Vengeance: Deluxe
description:
In Deluxe:
- The Cape of Harmonia for Pandora
- In-game Soundtrack

Depraved cultists have opened a portal to the Dark Realm and a demonic invasion has begun! Pandora ventures into the depths of Hell to slay the dark powers who threaten to conquer the World of Light. Collect Soul Orbs to upgrade your abilities and uncover arcane weaponry hidden perilously in the deepest dungeons. Run, jump and slash your way through frozen wastelands, lava filled chambers and living caverns made of putrefying flesh as you do battle with hordes of condemned monstrosities. Defeat the many merciless masters of each stage to reach the final showdown with the Devil Herself!

name: Park Ranger: Lost in the Woods
description: Explore the map and search for clues relating to the missing person's report, but be careful. You're not alone, you are being followed. Looking at him only makes it worse, he is always watching. He is always coming.

name: Stellabits
description: Stellabits is a puzzle game that aims to clear levels by controlling various gimmicks while operating four characters. The clear condition of the level is to collect all the stars in the field. There is no element of action, and pure procedural thinking is required.

name: Keeper of the Keys
description: Collect the keys, open all the doors and get to the exit. Hardcore 3D platformer for survival and hidden object.

name: I'm Late
description: An arcade game, stylized on an 8-bit production from the 90's.Go through the stages, where each next one increases the level of difficulty. An ideal game for players who like retro games. Thanks to its simplicity, the game is also perfect for younger players.

name: Jump Ball
description:
In this game you play as a ball and you have to reach to the end of the level by spin the ball.

There are many different types of obstacles in the game, such as cliffs, trap, many obstacles and moving object are on the way you need to avoid them by jumping or moving around them in order to survive, etc.

This is a very difficult challenge, you need skilled operations and constant repeated attempts.

name: Soulslinger
description: Soulslinger is a challenging, fast paced runner with roguelike elements, in which you must reap your way through the Underworld! Dodge obstacles, eat pies, and get blessings to defeat threatening foes with the help of your powerful Soulvolver.

name: The Plumber Thing
description: Do plumbery things in this horror puzzle platformer!

name: JaDa Fishin'
description: JaDa Fishin' is a free relaxing quick-time fishing game. Collect up to 12 different types of fish on this incredible journey.

name: Miss Kawaii 2
description: Surrounded by many beautiful girls, a mind-blowing, sexy journey has started. Relax, clear your mind and enjoy.

name: Illumina Girls
description: Illumina Girls is an exhilarating 3D block breaking game with a new sensation.

name: My Life: Riding Stables 3
description: Put your heart and soul into looking after the well-being of your beloved four-legged friends on a beautiful stud farm, which you can expand over the course of the game. Climb into the saddle and enjoy challenging training sessions, fantastic tournaments…

name: Escape String
description:
Escape String, is a 2D puzzle game set in an undefined time and place. A small humanoid robot wakes up in the debris of a landfill inside a large factory.
He receives strange and enigmatic messages, from someone who apparently wants to help him. The robot's purpose is to explore the large factory where he is in search of answers about who he and his mysterious remote helper are.
The player does not control the robot directly and in real time, but inserts movement commands above its display in order to tell the robot when it is time to jump, to crouch and more.
It is therefore a puzzle game based on perspective: the player must calculate the spaces between the robot and the obstacles. The obstacles are initially totally static, but as they advance, they will be more and more dynamic and varied.
For example, we will have guard robots that will perform the same actions as our robot in a mirrored manner. There are currently 40 levels, with 8 types of obstacles.
The real challenge will consist in finishing the level with the minimum possible number of indications (input) and providing these commands in a single line (string), ending the level while simultaneously satisfying these conditions will unlock the ""gold chip"" of that particular level.
The ""gold chip"" will be used to unlock new skins for our robot. This title is therefore suitable both for those looking for a relaxing puzzle, given the non-dynamic gameplay, and for those looking for a challenge given its arcade nature.

name: Relayer Advanced
description: This game depicts the fierce battle between the "Starchildren" and the extraterrestrial "Relayer" and lets you use the "Hate" and "Big Bang" systems to lead the battle to victory!

name: Mosaique Neko Waifus 5
description: Unique hentai puzzle about flirting with cute anime Neko girls. "Neko Waifus" is a series loved by millions around the world.

name: The Villager and the Werewolf
description: In this game, when you fit the last piece of each jigsaw, you will hear a fantastic werewolf story written by Marta Machado and illustrated by Alexandre Rocha.

name: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Burst Forth!! Choro-gon Breath: Director's Cut
description:
The official game of the hugely popular “Miss Kobayashi’s Dragon Maid” manga comes to Steam as a director’s cut that reflects the passion of the development team! Fly, shoot, and punch... send enemies flying right before your eyes!

The director's cut of Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Burst Forth!! Choro-gon Breath contains additional personified illustrations of stage bosses specially drawn by original author coolkyousinnjya, adjusted difficulty for each stage, and select between normal mode and director’s cut mode in-game.

name: Fix My Hand Doc
description: Fix My Hand Doc is a simulator that teaches you how to proceed in various extreme situations. Your mission is to be a doctor who will have to treat the hands of different patients.

name: Assassin's Vol.
description: Assassin's Vol. is a level puzzle game.

name: The Pizza Quiz
description: Do you want to learn some amazing facts about pizzas? We have the right game for you The Pizza Quiz.

name: Stranger of Paradise: Final Fantasy Origin - Wanderer of the Rift
description:
Fight your way through the Labyrinth of Dimensions, a dungeon that randomly configures your path to unlock pieces of the story. “Wanderer of the Rift” will introduce a new job, Blue Mage, and special monsters you can fight and summon into battle with the use of a Summoning Stone.

In addition to new equipment that unlocks new abilities, a new class of enemies called “Chaotic Monsters” will be added to give the player a more diverse and challenging experience.

name: Titanium Hound
description: Titanium Hound is retro-looking video game in cyberpunk genre, where you are going to pilot huge and agile exoskeleton to crush hordes of crazed security drones and abominations to uncover conspiracy carefully crafted by one of global corporations.

name: Temple of Horror
description: Escape the dangerous beings lurking in the dark, dodge countless deadly traps and slowly unruffle the secret of the Temple of Horror while not just trying to survive but to find your way out of this hell. Are you ready?

name: Case Files: The Death of Paulette Williams
description: A real-time, police interrogation and detective simulator, where you control the course of the investigation.

name: USAC: Code Breach
description: USAC: Code Breach is a unique coop experience based on a French cyberpunk universe. As a special police unit, you and your partner are brought to investigate a sudden shutdown of a research facility. Between reflection and action, you must survive a situation that is beyond you.

name: Ailin: Traps and Treasures
description: Help Ailin to collect treasures in this block-pushing puzzle game inspired by classics like Sokoban and Minesweeper. Navigate through traps and mines and retrieve treasure chests.

name: Artifacts of Eyru
description: Artifacts of Eyru is a rogue-lite first person shooter with RPG elements. Play as 4 classes as you delve into the dungeons of Eyru, claim powerful artifacts, and unravel the mysteries of the planet.

name: The Bad Son
description: The Bad Son is the anti-authority indie horror RPG that your parents don't want you to play.

name: Grey Block
description:
A story-rich, 3rd-person, cinematic, stealth puzzle/shooter that asks the player to help Theo Church escape the Green Valley Psychiatric Hospital where he has been committed while unravelling the conspiracy that landed him there.

As Theo, you’ll have to navigate the hospital’s halls as stealthily as possible while collecting as much evidence by hacking computer terminals, locating paper documents, and taking pictures of items that need to be seen to be believed. You’ll have to maneuver around security guards, and lure them out of their offices so you can access their terminal and increase your keycard access. This will allow you to push deeper into the hospital and uncover more of its secrets with the ultimate goal of reaching the highly-secure, state-of-the-art, research wing donated by Theo’s father - Church Institute of Psychological Research, but referred to amongst the patients of Green Valley as Grey Block.

What secrets will you uncover in the world of Grey Block?

name: Asha
description: A 2D pixel art platform game where you have only one life. Traverse scenarios while becoming stronger by defeating elemental bosses.

name: Robotry!
description: Wreak havoc in a physics-based world! Walk, jump, kick, grab and throw by directly controlling each leg. Go from a glitching toddler to a somersaulting acrobat in the story mode, or tackle your friends in multiplayer versus modes.

name: Rad Dude
description: Survive in the end times, craft wasteland weapons in this unique Idle Survival RPG! Use skill points and prestige your way across Rad Dude: Doomsday Survival!

name: Grimstar: The Battle for Green Moon
description: Grimstar: The Battle for Green Moon is the free version of the real-time strategy game Grimstar. The aim is to mine all the crystals on the map. The more you mine - the more of hostile alien life will besiege you. Your ultimate goal is to colonize the new world completely.

name: Gimmick Heart
description: Gimmick Heart is a cute action platformer for all ages. Currently only released in Japanese.

name: Beasts Shall Rise
description: The 4th Horseman of the apocolapse has unleashed hell on earth. It's down to you to clean up the mess. Beasts Shall Rise is an action packed VR looter shooter roguelike horror with full freedom of movement and immersive AAA quality visuals.

name: Harvester
description: Dig up corpse parts, butcher them, and feed a demon in this deranged survival horror game. Submission for 14th RPG Maker Horror Game Jam.

name: Borrowed Book
description: Borrowed Book is a simple yet heavy-dialogue; psychological horror RPG Maker game on two microorganisms attempting to completing their chores for the librarian to get out from the library quickly.

name: Monster Hide
description: In Monster Hide play as the monster and kill all the humans or work as a team to kill the monster, you can also fight with other players in pvp mode or survive waves of zombies, with different game modes and environment the game has elements of strategy, cooperation and survival.

name: Recruta Zero
description: Help Maçonaro find his way to the Hague tribunal. A disastrous government full of chloroquine and Viagra with a climate of famine and genocide. Recruta Zero encourages hatred in the population, leaving the country full of cracks.

name: Vital Bracelet Arena
description: A companion app for the Vital Bracelet, Vital Bracelet BE and Vital Hero virtual pet. Players can fight in online battles, send characters on adventures to locate items, archive thwir characters and raise their stats.

name: West Hunt: Halloween Pack
description: Halloween DLC with scary Sheriff's monsters and more stuff

name: New Super Mario Bros. Versus: Cubby's Character Mod
description: A mod of New Super Mario Bros. Versus that added a variety of new character options and stages.

name: Victoria 3: Grand Edition
description:
Get the full experience of Victoria 3 with the Grand Edition, which includes the base game as well as the expansion pass, including:

Melodies for the Masses Music Pack
Dawn of Wonder Art Pack
Voice of the People Immersion Pack
Sphere of Influence Expansion
The Expansion Pass Bonus: The American Building Pack

name: Payday 2: Lost in Transit Heist
description: The Lost in Transit Heist is available on its own or as part of the Lost in Transit Bundle.

name: Generation Zero: Motorbikes Pack
description: You can now travel through Östertörn on new types of Motorbikes! It’s faster. It’s louder. It’s more exciting! The motorbikes will get you places quicker, but they’ll need fuel to drive. Plan your travel strategically so you won't run out of gasoline unexpectedly, and be sure to check out abandoned cars and gas stations and find jerry cans to fuel up. Or craft the fuel by yourself! You can ride on 3 different models. Each of them has their own strengths and weaknesses.

name: Fallen London: A Devil's Due
description: This is a DLC for the game Fallen London. It is part of the Exceptional Stories, a monthly release of new stories that are available for subscribers (Exceptional Friends) for free, and available for purchase afterwards.

name: Good Boy 2
description:
Happy birthday...again! Sadly before you have any cake mommy said you have to go see the doctor! What is she thinking? It's your birthday it should be time for cake, time to play with the cats! But don't worry, I'm sure nothing bad will happen..

Good Boy 2 is the sequel to Good Boy 1 and takes place a couple of years after the events of the first game. Featuring a new story and hand drawn graphics.

name: Poe
description: Sin descripción

name: Train Sim World 3: New Journeys - S-Bahn Köln BR 423
description: Get to work on the bustling Köln S-Bahn, take on new challenges and explore more on Schnellfahrstrecke Köln - Aachen with Train Sim World 2: New Journeys – S-Bahn Köln BR 423.

name: Train Sim World 3: New Journeys - CSX SD40
description: Bring back the origins of CSX, take on new challenges and explore more on Sand Patch Grade with Train Sim World 2: New Journeys - CSX SD40.

name: Age of Empires: 25th Anniversary Collection
description:
The following games are included in the 25th Anniversary Collection:

- Age of Empires: Definitive Edition
- Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition
- Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition - Lords of the West
- Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition - Dawn of the Dukes
- Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition - Dynasties of India
- Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition
- Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition - United States Civilization
- Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition - Mexico Civilization
- Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition - The African Royals
- Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition - Knights of the Mediterranean
- Age of Empires IV: Anniversary Edition

name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 1 & 2 Double Pack
description: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 1 & 2 have been bundled together to provide a challenging collective experience, with two dramatic single-player campaigns. Immerse yourself by using a mix of stealth, tactics and precision to take out your targets with the most satisfying sniping gameplay.

name: Pressure Within
description: A post-apocalyptic third-person shooting game that reminds you of the true horrors of the apocalypse. Where do I use the bathroom? Rid the streets and suburbs of zombies and other monstrosities while you solve awful riddles.

name: Platonically Mauled by a Magic Cougar
description: As nuts as Jun is about his wife, he can’t help but drool over Towaka Minefuji. So when Jun is asked to attend his wife’s school committee meetings in her place, his brain goes into overdrive at the thought of him and Towaka being in the same room together...

name: Slippery Richard!: He's Taller Than My Husband
description: An unplanned shotgun wedding! This isn’t the first time Yaya has made a mess of things and expected her mother to clean up... “When you truly love someone, you plan ahead—marriage is supposed to come before all that other stuff! Now I guess it’s up to me to test if he’s really husband material...”

name: Gloomy Tales: Horrific Show - Collector's Edition
description: A magical circus adventure with true disappearance! Watch the performance of a traveling circus and don't let your sister be hurt by the forces of evil!

name: Grid Legends: Enduring Spirit
description: Can you handle the heat? Join Yume Tanaka and Seneca in the inaugural ‘Grid of Legends’ tournament featuring the iconic Fuji International Speedway.

name: Atomicrops: Deerly Beloved
description: It's harvest time down on the farm and we're gearing up to get spoooOOOooooky (please read that in a ghost voice). The Deerly Beloved DLC is the latest, Halloween-themed DLC for Atomicrops with a ton of eerie new additions and upgrades!

name: Hunt: Showdown - Fear the Reaper
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons and one Legendary Tool: The Reaper (Hunter), Quietus (Specter 1882 Compact), Memento Mori (Winfield M1876 Centennial), and The Scythe (Throwing Axe).

name: Miraculous: Rise of the Sphinx - Ultimate Edition
description:
Paris needs a hero! Once again, the city of lights is in trouble as it faces a new menace—the most threatening sentimonster ever created is about to take control! As you take on the personna’s of the globally renowned superheroez Ladybug and Cat Noir, you’ll need to unveil the diabolical plan hatched by archvillain Hawk Moth—and squash it! Immerse yourself into the magical world of Miraculous and level up your superpowers as you embark on your biggest journey yet!

Transform with the Ultimate Edition featuring the base game of Miraculous: Rise of the Sphinx and 3 exclusive costumes! De-evilize the streets of Paris in style with 2 exclusive Ladybug and 1 Cat Noir costume.

name: Click For Points
description: Click. That's all. You click for points!

name: Rhythm Stones
description: Rhythm Stones is a 1 button 3D rhythm game that crosses moving stepping stones.

name: Lazerhawk
description: arcade-style racing game inspired by the spirit of the early 90s, endless highway and an incredible sense of speed to create an exhilarating driving experience.

name: Dork
description: Leave the safety of your village and embark on the journey of adventure! By traveling through eight different and unique locations discover the forgotten history of your people and the tragedy that led to the creation of your civilization. Welcome to the world of Dork!

name: MetaMorphic Rippers
description: A fast-paced arena Brawler that combines the Stylish Combat of a Hack and Slash Game With Transformations, Players can select each Class with unique attributes and abilities for you to master.

name: Super Mabus Mania
description: We play the role of mabus, a retro collector who must collect all the games that his wife has taken away from home, enter them on the computer and advance to the next level. It's a fun screen-to-screen arcade game where your goal is to collect all the ga…

name: I Expect You to Die: Home Sweet Home
description: Become a secret agent in your own living room in this short mixed reality mini-mission. You have been smuggled out of a top-secret medical facility to recover in the comfort of your home. Fitted with your new ocular implant, you will decipher puzzles, dodge dangerous threats, fight robotic hornets, and use spy gadgets galore. Dr. Zor has set a trap - right in your home! It is up to you to thwart those plans and save the day.

name: El Paso, Nightmare
description: Slay hordes of vampires, werewolves, and Biblically-accurate angels in this standalone survival horror FPS side story from the El Paso, Elsewhere universe.

name: Neko Golf: Anime Golf
description: Made by Colopl, the ones who made White Cat Project, an anime golf game for iOS and Android devices. It has an easy to understand swipe swing system that puts you in control with each of your swings. As of right now play as one of five characters and customize them with outfits through the game's Gatcha system. Earn more clubs and level them up to up your stats to your liking just by playing. No worries about pay to win, even with good stats, your swing really affects the accuracy of your shot, so a lot of this is skill based. You can play casually or competitively in battle mode, make friends, create rooms and play up to 9 holes in public or private matches, voice chat, rank up and enter in weekly tournaments or special events.

name: Blue Bird Land Ep 2.
description: Blue Bird Land is an AVG with horror and puzzle elements. In each chapter, the form of the game is unique and different from others. Let’s follow the alluring characters, addicted to the dangerous amusement park!

name: Chernobylite: Season 3 - Green Walls
description: From special game mode for players who love extreme challenges to the much-anticipated part of the map with two never completed cooling towers on the premises of the infamous power plant and a brand-new weapon.

name: My Big Sister: Remastered
description:
Take control of Luzia and explore a fantasy world full of spirits, ghosts, and other unnatural monstrosities as the sisters try to find a way to break the curse and return home. Search for objects to solve simple puzzles and talk to characters to unravel the lore behind both "My Big Sister" and "Ashina: The Red Witch".

Across the game’s multiple chapters in My Big Sister, players can expect to clear puzzles and find specific items should they wish to advance through the game’s story, but be sure to take your time. With plenty of secrets and multiple endings, you’ll have your work cut out for you to make sure you get the ending Luzia, Sombria, and Ashina deserve.

name: Psychosis: Teaser
description:
Psychosis is a first-person psychological survival-horror game about familicide, presented in a retro, derezzed art style.

When a family goes missing and you receive a mysterious phone call, all hell breaks loose as you are plunged into an expansive world where demons hunt you down and logic is turned inside out. Battle with the shreds of your own humanity through an hour of mind-breaking gameplay packed with combat, puzzles and mystery.

name: Dark Tales from México: Prelude. Just a Dream... with the Sack Man
description: An Handmade 3D Survival Horror based on true Mexican Folk Tales and Clay Sculptures.

name: Mighty Math
description: Mighty Math is a mind bending fusion of arcade survival and brain training all in one. Anyone can pick it up and play. It starts with a simple premise, collect a required set of numbers before all numbers run out to survive each round. As you collect numbers you will change the player value. You must maintain a player value between 0 and 9. If you go over or under this value range you will be instantly destroyed.

name: Truck Journey
description: Join this Truck Journey thorough the racing in the car. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Ducky Quacky
description: Ducky Quacky is 3D Platformer Game, Our main character is a Duck living in Duckland. He's a Duckish! You must collect all the keys in the levels, open the lock and go to the next level.

name: Game of Dragons: Deluxe Edition
description: This bundle includes the Game of Dragons base game and 7 DLCs.

name: The Demon Within Me
description: The Demon Within Me is a first-person psychological horror game featuring a dark, lonely, and atmospheric environment that offers an immersive and disturbing experience.

name: Garbage Pail Kids: Mad Mike and the Quest for Stale Gum
description: Garbage Pail Kids are back in this Long-Lost, All-New platforming adventure. Featuring four playable characters, six secret-filled levels, and a trading-card system, Garbage Pail Kids: Mad Mike and the Quest for Stale Gum is a throwback to the golden era of 80s gaming.

name: Cult: Chapter One
description: Find what you came for and escape, before they get what they want...

name: Remy Raccoon and the Lost Temple: Halloween Hijinks - Volume 2
description: Remy Raccoon is back in this Halloween special of our cute, gem-grabbing arcade game. Join Remy in 11 brand new Halloween levels filled with fiendish traps and malevolent creatures. Your adventure awaits...

name: Victoria 3: Day One Edition
description: The game in and exclusive case with attached art book.

name: So Below
description: Gear up, hunt, adapt, survive. Engage in a co-op survival horror experience with up to 4 players online. Explore the haunted location, find the clues and tools needed to complete the ritual and defeat the entity. Will you be able to survive?

name: Personal Chef to the Stars
description: “Personal Chef to the Stars” is a menu management simulator, Romantic Comedy Yuri Visual Novel, and Dating Sim. Play as Chef Ayesha Rogers as she must balance the needs and desires of a household filled with eccentric celebrities while also managing her own budding love life.

name: Miraculous: Rise of the Sphinx
description: Paris needs a hero! Once again, the city of lights is in trouble as it faces a new menace—the most threatening sentimonster ever created is about to take control! As you take on the personna’s of the globally renowned superheroez Ladybug and Cat Noir, you’ll need to unveil the diabolical plan hatched by archvillain Hawk Moth—and squash it! Immerse yourself into the magical world of Miraculous and level up your superpowers as you embark on your biggest journey yet!

name: Devil Devour Alive DX
description: Devil Devour Alive DX is a pick-up-and-play occult themed arcade game with an over the top 90s style. It supports vertical screen orientation, online leaderboards, and unlockables. It also features retro 32-bit era style graphics, CRT shader, and spooky synth-wave music.

name: Chicken Feet
description: Chicken Feet is a first person survival-stealth horror game about a giant, angry chicken. Descend into the depths of GOOBER laboratories and uncover the horrors that lie beneath the lab's shiny façade.

name: Cursed 3
description: The epic conclusion of the CURSED trilogy.

name: Dark Past
description: Dark Past is based on psychological horror by paranormal activity occurring during your investigations. Play solo or up to 4 players to try and solve the mystery of what entity is left behind.

name: Yomawari: Lost in the Dark - Deluxe Edition
description: A young girl awakens in a dark, unfamiliar forest with no recollection of how she got there. As she searches for a way out, she crosses paths with a mysterious individual who reveals to her that she’s been cursed. In order to break the curse, she needs to explore the streets of her town at night to seek out her lost memories. However, malevolent ghosts lurk within the shadows, and the girl must avoid them by running, hiding, and shutting her eyes if she hopes to survive long enough to break her curse.

name: Para Eyes
description: Para Eyes is a spot the difference point and click horror game. You are tasked with the responsibility of monitoring live security cameras and reporting anomalies. Keep your eyes open, your sanity up, and survive the night!

name: Hajis
description: You have to maintain your mentality in an place where any sound can cause your deathHajis is a survival co-op game 1-4 players.

name: Simulacra 3
description: The town of Stonecreek is haunted. People keep disappearing into thin air, leaving nothing but an eerie symbol behind. With the townsfolk gripped with fear, use a missing victim's phone to unlock the truth in the third entry of the acclaimed horror series, Simulacra.

name: Murder Is Game Over
description: Murder Is Game Over is a pixel art point-and-click murder mystery involving the untimely death of a famous game designer. You and your trusty companion are on the case!

name: Blue Bird Land Ep. 1
description: Blue Bird Land is an AVG with horror and puzzle elements. There are six endings and four levels. In each level, the form of the game is unique and different from others. Let’s follow the alluring characters, addicted to the dangerous amusement park!

name: Settlement Survival
description: In this city-builder, you will lead a group of survivors in their search for a new home. With limited supplies you will claim land, plant crops, hunt wildlife, gather supplies, build your city, expand commerce, and develop trades to build a bustling and unique town with a large population.

name: Last Command
description: Last Command is a fast-paced Snake x Bullet Hell action game. Maneuver through enemies’ barrage of attacks, collect Data Points to deal damage! Mix and match skill chips as you progress, overcome intense Boss battles, and uncover the secrets of their program world...

name: Victoria 3
description: Paradox Development Studio invites you to build your ideal society in the tumult of the exciting and transformative 19th century. Balance the competing interests in your society and earn your place in the sun in Victoria 3, one of the most anticipated games in Paradox’s history.

name: Wedding Designer
description: Agency simulator that deals with organizing weddings in unusual locations. Some look for fashionable places, others originality. This is where imagination counts. Our agency can organize a wedding party in such extraordinary places as an old farm, a junkyard, an abandoned factory, a fishing port or a funfair.

name: Spinal Fantasy
description: Spinal Fantasy is a 10 minutes parody game of Final Fantasy 7. It starts with Sephiroth stealing the spine of Cloud, who tries to retrieve it. On his way he meets Tifa, Aerith and Black Mage whom also have things stolen from them.

name: Goblin Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: The Nom
description: You were turned into a dark creature by evil scientists and finally managed to break free! It's time for revenge!

name: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
description: The first Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann mobile game is here! Produced by TRIGGER, this faithful adaptation will bring you back to the good old days of a drill's romance. Join forces with Team Gurren for an epic journey. The sky is the limit!

name: V Rising: Haunted Nights Castle Pack
description:
Capture the essence of the season of decay with the Haunted Nights Castle Pack.

Surround yourself with dark symbols, candles within skulls, and hollowed-out cadavers of gourds. Pair them with tasteful windows and carpets that reflect the color of the falling leaves, and dress your walls with some tasteful spiderwebbing to set the mood.

This pack provides a host of options to decorate your castle in the theme of the autumnal season when the scorching sunlight hours begin to wane, and the creeping claws of death slowly take the verdant green plant life. Don’t be afraid of getting used to them, as once you acquire these decorations, you’ll be free to use them regardless of the time of year. What is time to an immortal creature of the night anyway?

The DLC is unlocked in parts after completing the Journal Quests: “Lord of Shadows,” “The First book in the Library” and “Expanding my Domain.”

name: Apocryphauna
description: Content Warning: contains depictions of transphobia, homophobia, religious extremism, and child abuse, along with brief violent and tryphopobic imagery.

name: Smells Like Grandma's
description: Medium-large grungy metal sci-fi map with platforming aspects, built for Copper v1.19+

name: Rent Please!: Landlord Sim
description: As a good landlord, how will you build your community?

name: Along Came a Spider
description:
A pocket sized, cranking, top down adventure. Tasked with retrieving an heirloom for The Monarch of The Hollow, a cunning spider by the name of Eric Nid leaves the nest and steps out into Spindleton to fulfil his quest - but the town is full of danger. Luckily, Eric isn't alone. A plucky band of memorable spider siblings can be found to aid him on his way.

Search high and low to find a path to the heirloom and crank with precision to overcome the obstacles standing in your way. There are five different ways Eric's story can wrap up, can you get back to the nest in one piece?

name: Togum
description: Priscilla was enjoying the holiday eve at her house, however, her friend Nara discovers a series of codes and hidden messages inside an abandoned house. Could these codes be related to the strange lights that have appeared in the middle of the sea? Based on a true story...

name: Daemonum
description: Detective Andrews is called to a residence after a message is placed to dispatch regarding a disturbance. Not everything is as it seems, leaving you to question your own sanity whilst figuring out how to escape with your life.

name: Dear Nostalgia
description: Text-based adventure horror short game

name: Across the Obelisk: Spooky Night in Senenthia
description: A sinister moon rises over Senenthia and our heroes dress up for the occasion. With this DLC, you will get 7 new Halloween themed skins and 1 exclusive cardback for your heroes.

name: Kanji RPG
description: An RPG-lite game where you learn how to read Japanese by battling cute monsters! Track your progress by collecting stamps and unlock new areas as you go.

name: One Million Miles
description:
Take to the stars in this tranquil endless runner - and explore an infinite universe, run after run.
Travel a million miles and more by accelerating off planetary orbits, avoiding asteroids and meteors and charging your ship’s shield and hyperdrive with mysterious orbs.
Explore the vast beauty of the cosmos and get up close with stars, black holes and distant civilisations.

name: Fading Light: Antiworld
description: The post-war world of nuclear explosion has trapped you in a dark circulated antiworld. Armed only with a faint flashlight and antimatter collector, you have to generate enough energy and hold on till the first sight of the morning light. Hurry, but be careful, it's rumored that you are not alone...

name: Ace Pilot Europe
description: Arcade style World War 2 aircraft game. Control multiple fighters in dogfights. Fly bombing run with B25 and B17. Hunt submarines with a B24. Drop paratroopers in a C47. Attack trains. 10 different missions over Europe. This is my second indie game and it's a lot of fun.

name: Valkyrie Love Goddess
description:
You’re just another typical high school senior, or at least, you thought you were. On the eve of your 18th birthday, you dream about the mythical Norse hammer Mjolnir falling to Earth and wake up with godlike strength. Your newfound power ends up ruining every job you try to take on, so your friend jokingly recommends a new gig at the ‘Valkyrie Detective Agency.’

As it turns out, the agency is led by the Norse goddess Freyja and her valkyrie warrior, and they’re on a quest to retrieve Thor’s hammer… but things get complicated when the trickster god Loki shows up and attempts to bring about Ragnarok—the apocalypse.

name: Alpha Sphere Zero: Rotten Brains
description: Rotten Brains (can be considered "Alpha Sphere Zero: Rotten Brains") is a complete overhaul SMW Horror ROM Hack focused on pure storytelling and atmosphere. This is the prequel to Alpha Sphere the original.

name: Jive Blocks
description: Jive Blocks is a colorful daily puzzle game to keep your mind sharp. Slide the small blocks around to place them all on their matching background color. All blocks slide together, but black blocks don't slide at all. If you ever get stuck, you can reset the board with the "Reset" button or use up to 3 hints per game with the "Use Hint" button.

name: Wheel of Innocence
description: Wheel of Innocence is a lesbian visual novel where you peer into the life of a disabled high schooler named Reina.

name: Cargo
description: An old abandoned ship contains a precious cargo, but what is it, and is it worth the risk? You can try and make your way to the main deck and claim the treasure some vanished protecting.

name: Dungeon in a Bottle
description:
Dungeon in a Bottle is a precision platformer about choosing the right kind of jump in claustrophobic situations.

The acrobatic thief, Reya, has gotten himself trapped in a magic bottle, and now he must use every jump at his disposal to escape the treacherous dungeon within! Hopefully he'll grab some treasure while he's at it.

Perform difficult jumps while getting crushed by spikes, smashed by walls, and dissolved in goop in this platformer that takes the genre in a unique direction.

name: Castlevania: The Last Tear
description: A brand new Castlevania Hack, all to be discovered with new beautiful graphics, new levels and new music

name: The Thing at the Window
description:
You live with your father in the rural American midwest. He left you home alone while he's out of town for the weekend, and you heard on the radio that there's a large storm heading your way.

You live in a rather underdeveloped part of the country so you're off the power grid, but fortunately your dad's pretty handy and he's wired up your old farmhouse to a gas generator, which you moved to the basement to keep it out of the storm. The basement smells kind of funny and it's really hazy down there, but it should be okay for now. There's a big fuel tank outside where you can refill your jerry can, and dad refilled it before he left. There's also a big pile of wooden boards out front from when your dad renovated the barn over the summer, so you can use those to board up the windows just in case.

The storm should be here soon and you're as prepared as you can be, but still you feel uneasy; something's not quite right... you feel as if something's lurking out there, watching.

Your goal is to survive three nights of the Thing trying to force its way into your home, by barricading doors and windows. The thing really doesn't like light, so you can drive it away with your rechargeable flashlight. You can also "reinforce" parts of the house by turning lights on, which will slow the thing's attacks at the cost of draining more power and needing to refill the generator more frequently.

name: Chased
description: Chased is a single-player horror game. You will have to try to find the exit and proceed to the next upcoming levels. But remember you are not alone. On every single level, there are going to be different entities that will not let you escape by trying to trap and catch you.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XIV: Message in a Bottle
